name: Poor Developer (Playmanity Demo)
description:
Interesting game I made for Playmanity Game Jam!

The theme is : "Best Ad Intergration"

Try solve puzzles using blocks of ads! Whenever you left ads on your screen you'll earn coins!  Can you solve them and get enough money to get to the next area?

Left & RIght Arrow - Move
Space & Shift - Jump
Z - Skip Dialogue
Down Arrow - Fall through platforrms
Up Arrow - Enter Doors

Platformer Assets by Kenney
